mapper.delete: delete from cg_form where id in #{item}
delete from cg_form where path = #{path} AND table_id = #{tableId}

#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update cg_form set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, table_id = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_title = #{headTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_flow = #{isFlow,jdbcType=TINYINT}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag_title = #{tagTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, label_position = #{labelPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_dialog = #{isDialog,jdbcType=TINYINT}, continue_add = #{continueAdd,jdbcType=TINYINT}, images = #{images,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, view_properties = #{viewProperties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_properties = #{formProperties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slot_templates = #{slotTemplates,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, action_list = #{actionList,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
